fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Trade, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: Meeting rounds with EU decision makers on Hilton key priorities including visa and travel facilitation, youth employment and EU tourism policy are regularly organised.

goals__remit: Hilton is a global hospitality company which manages, franchises, leases and occasionally owns hotels from a portfolio of 14 brands including Waldorf Astoria, Conrad and Hilton Garden Inn. Hilton now has a presence in 25 of the 28 EU member states and these hotels employ around 30,000 people
position: Head of Government Relations EMEA at Hilton
